title: New: East Of Ely – Easy Friend
body: With [Panama Wedding](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/23221-new-panama-wedding-all-of-the-people/) leading the way for intelligent, anthemic pop song writing, Sydney five piece **East Of Ely** look set to follow in the footsteps of the _All Of The People_ star. Their debut track, _Easy Friend_ is bold, silky sweet and sure to ignite a fire on the Hype Machine. With one of the finest choruses of the year, here’s hoping that _East Of Ely_ have plenty more like this up their sleeves
